tool.name: SC3 kmeans
tool.help:
Usage: /Users/ct5/anaconda3/envs/galaxy/bin/sc3-sc3-kmeans.R [options]
Options: -i INPUT-OBJECT-FILE, --input-object-file=INPUT-OBJECT-FILE File name in which a transformed SC3 'SingleCellExperiment' object has been stored after processed with sc3_calc_transfs()
-k KS, --ks=KS A comma-separated string or single value representing the number of clusters k to be used for SC3 clustering.
-o OUTPUT-OBJECT-FILE, --output-object-file=OUTPUT-OBJECT-FILE File name for R object of type 'SingleCellExperiment' from SC3 in which to store the kmeans clustering as metadata.
-h, --help Show this help message and exit
